title: LeaverBuster
body:
FFS I DC then I get put in a LPQ Really so harsh its happening so often that I honestly don't feel like playn LOL, Can u please make it so if u dc or have over 1000 ping you don't get put in a LPQ or something smarter idk its just annoying....

and I don't get some people in League like ive got 3k Ping but they get angry when I wait at base till my ping gets better...
in not feeding cuz of ping idk why they getting angry -_-
